author: Staff Reporter
text:
Burglars decamp with gold, cash and silver

As much as 140 sovereigns of gold jewels, silver articles weighing about five kilograms and Rs. 4 lakh in cash were stolen from the house of a medical shop owner near here.

Kamaraj (60), a resident of Nallavanpalayam is running a medical shop in Mungilthuraipattu. Since the wedding of his daughter is scheduled to be held on February 10, he and his wife Arulselvi went outstation on Wednesday to distribute invitations. As his daughter is working in Chennai and son is in the U.S. the couple left the home locked. The milkman and others noticed that the lock of his house was broken on Friday morning. On coming to know about this the couple rushed back only to see gold jewels, silver articles and cash missing from home. Burglars have broken the locks of front grill gate and main door. A case has been booked. — Staff Reporter
title: Burglars decamp with gold, cash and silver articles
